WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

I'm using PHPExcel to create some some charts, but the axis labels are always too big. 
Is there a way to change the font size or other styling parameters for these labels?

This is the code that creates the chart and labels, if needed for reference:

$xTitle = new PHPExcel_Chart_Title('Months');
$yTitle = new PHPExcel_Chart_Title('Consumption');

$chart = new PHPExcel_Chart(
  'chart1',                                      // name
  null,                                           // title
  $legend,                                    // legend
  $plotarea,                                  // plotArea
  true,                                          // plotVisibleOnly
  0,                                              // displayBlanksAs
  $xTitle,                                      // xAxisLabel
  $yTitle		                          // yAxisLabel
);


Thanks,
Sami
